channel.title: Coder needed [Pic] ~Godog
channel.description: [hr] [b]NEED A CODER[/b] [color=black][b]So I'm creating a new Runescape Private Server and i need help coding it, i know it's going be a BIG hit so if you come help out you can get co-owner and you'll not only get owner but have LOADS of fun![/b] [hr] [hr] [b]The Motto[/b] [b]This new server is going be like a family are motto is "Where dreams come true!" and for everyone who plays it will have the best time ever playing it. Everyone's dream will come true in this Server[/b] [hr] [hr] [b]How will we perfect are motto?[/b] [b]Well i have ton's of idea's, we can also get idea's from are players there is no day we can't get better! we will perfect everything! we will make it the game everyone want to play! we will have the best pking, mini games, clan wars, ext...[/b] [hr] [hr] [b]How we will run[/b] [b]Well i have to use hamachi for now, cause the only way i can port-forward is resetting my router (which at the moment i can't do.) are pk shops are already set up are donater shops already set up all are shops are good too go![/b] [hr] [hr] [b]Online?[/b] [b]I want to get everything coded all the idea's down before we go online i believe if i find the right coder we can go above and beyond with this server![/b] [hr] [hr] [b]I'd like to say.[/b] [b]The server i have right now is leeched i did it so it was much easier for the coder and i, but we will [b]TRANSFORM[/b] the server [b]WE WILL IMPROVE[/b] this server we will make it better then its has ever been![/b] [hr] [hr] [b]Staff List[/b] [b]Owner:Godog ~Hoster Co-Owner:tzhaar ~Web designer/coder Co-owner:______ ~main coder Admin:_______ ~Head of the admin's Admin:_______ ~Watch and too look for bugs Mod:________~ To make sure people are using good words and head of the mods Mod:_______ ~Be a friendly person someone people can look up too Mod:_______ ~The one that knows everything and people can go to him[/b] [hr] [hr] [size=36pt][b][font=impact]WHERE DREAMS COME TRUE![/font][/b][/size]

item.title: Coder needed [Pic] ~Godog
item.dc:creator: @godog godog
item.description:
@godog wrote:

[hr]
NEED A CODER
[color=black]So I’m creating a new Runescape Private Server and i need help coding it, i know it’s going be a BIG hit so if you come help out you can get co-owner and you’ll not only get owner but have LOADS of fun!
[hr]
[hr]
The Motto
This new server is going be like a family are motto is “Where dreams come true!” and for everyone who plays it will have the best time ever playing it. Everyone’s dream will come true in this Server
[hr]
[hr]
How will we perfect are motto?
Well i have ton’s of idea’s, we can also get idea’s from are players there is no day we can’t get better! we will perfect everything! we will make it the game everyone want to play! we will have the best pking, mini games, clan wars, ext…
[hr]
[hr]
How we will run
Well i have to use hamachi for now, cause the only way i can port-forward is resetting my router (which at the moment i can’t do.)
are pk shops are already set up are donater shops already set up all are shops are good too go!
[hr]
[hr]
Online?
I want to get everything coded all the idea’s down before we go online i believe if i find the right coder we can go above and beyond with this server!
[hr]
[hr]
I’d like to say.
The server i have right now is leeched i did it so it was much easier for the coder and i, but we will TRANSFORM the server WE WILL IMPROVE this server we will make it better then its has ever been!
[hr]
[hr]
Staff List
Owner:Godog ~Hoster
Co-Owner:tzhaar ~Web designer/coder
Co-owner:______ ~main coder
Admin:_______ ~Head of the admin’s
Admin:_______ ~Watch and too look for bugs
Mod:________~ To make sure people are using good words and head of the mods
Mod:_______ ~Be a friendly person someone people can look up too
Mod:_______ ~The one that knows everything and people can go to him
[hr]
[hr]
[size=36pt][font=impact]WHERE DREAMS COME TRUE![/font][/size]

Read full topic
